data.title: Affordable Green & Natural Funerals
data.meta_description: Learn more about green burials & natural burials at the Co-op Funeral Home of People's Memorial, a nonprofit funeral home that serves the Seattle area.
data.text:
Green & Natural Burial

We are proud to be certified by the Green Burial Council and to be able to provide green burial and cremation services in cooperation with natural burial parks in our state.

Green or Natural Burial means:

A naturally prepared body, no chemical preservation;

Placement in a biodegradable casket or cloth shroud;

Interred directly into the soil with no concrete grave liner or vault;

No monuments punctuate the landscape;

Native grasses, trees, and shrubs grace the property; and,

The burial site is part of a larger greenspace preserved for future generations to enjoy.

Green Burial Plans - effective April 3, 2024

Direct Green Burial without Graveside Service

$2,250 PMA Pricing $2,650 Standard Pricing

This plan includes a Kinkaraco Purelight Natural Fiber Shroud, delivery of casketed remains Monday through Friday between 9am and 5pm to a cemetery within the 30-mile service radius. Burial date and time will be coordinated with the natural burial park without next-of-kin present for the burial.

Green Burial with a Graveside Service

$2,705 PMA Pricing $3,180 Standard Pricing

This plan includes a Kinkaraco Purelight Natural Fiber Shroud, delivery of casketed remains Monday through Friday between 9am and 5pm to a cemetery within the 30-mile service radius. Burial date and time will be coordinated with the natural burial park with the next-of-kin present for a graveside service or witnessed burial.

Green Caskets and Shrouds Catalog

Kinkaraco Purelight Linen Shroud (included in Package Plans)

Upgrade options by Passages International Woven Caskets - 5% of upgraded casket proceeds will be donated to the Funeral Financial Assistance Fund with People's Memorial.

Area Cemeteries Certified by the Green Burial Council

PMA members receive a 15% discount on plots and services at this cemetery.
